subject: Relief for Contractors-Developers of Road Sector in view of COVID-19 pandemic - reg.
text: HRay 744 RTHNf giferaszrot (Tev5 wRdev & RTHPf FA4, 4RG TAR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 77A * 61-5 Q 6, Raer-10, aRqp; # @crf}f 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 T/Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAVPolicy Guidelines/Misc. Guidelines/2022 Policy Circular No. 18.81/2022 dated April, 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/COVID-19/RoadMap/CMD/2020 (Computer No: 5788)} Sub.: Relief for  Contractors-Developers of Road Sector in view of COVID-19 pandemic- reg: MoRTH vide Letter No COVID-19 /RoadMap/ JS(H)/2020 dated 11.04.2022 on the subject mentioned above has provided some relief measures period of 6 months from 01.04.2022 to 31.10.2022 . A copy of the same is attached herewith for information and implementation: 2 This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority. Encl:: As above 4l22 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord: _ To: All Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 _ Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. 2. Library for hosting the circular on library site_ 3. Web Admin for circulation. M 7 7 9 NHAI 28th for 281 Copy
